Text: Sunset at Chaophraya (Thai: คู่กรรม , "Khu Kam") in 2013 romantic-war-drama film directed by Kittikorn Liasirikun.

1:
--------------------
Text: Sunset at Chaophraya (2013 film):  Adapted from the novel "Khu Kam" by Thommayanti, the story is a love triangle, set in World War II-era Thailand, and depicts the star-crossed romance between an Imperial Japanese Navy officer and a Thai woman who is involved with the Free Thai resistance.
